title: The filibuster and the GOP: Kasie Hunt, Nathan Gonzales and Adam Jentleson
description: NBC News Capitol Hill Correspondent Kasie Hunt and Nathan Gonzales, Editor & Publisher of Inside Elections, join Chuck to talk about the future of the Republican Party. Plus, Adam Jentleson, author of "Kill Switch: The Rise of the Modern Senate and the Crippling of American Democracy" talks about the history of the filibuster and why it might be reformed.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
